title: Pics of walk through seats wtd

posts.content: Well as I said, my seats are both two piece seats. They fix at the rear into "U" brackets on either side. I've seen the three position brackets for sale. the front of the seats just bear down onto rubber plugs, pushed into holes in the tub. Maybe, if I buy some of those three position brackets, I may have what I want already. Ought to move this to "tech" lol..
